description:
Using the revolt against Haman to take control of Axis, Glemy battles Chara`s fleet. Judau and Roux use the chance to sneak into Core 3 in order to kidnap Mineva, but fail. As the Nahel Argama appears to be supporting Haman`s side, Ple-Two approaches in the new mobile armor Quin-Mantha.
Source: crunchyroll
